channel.title: Still got the shop problem (error)
channel.description:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: 2" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at ShopHandler.loadShops(ShopHandler.java:117) at ShopHandler.<init>(ShopHandler.java:30) at server.main(server.java:35)
anyone know the error?
i placed something in shop.cfg and know i got this error!!!
any help!

item.title: Still got the shop problem (error)
item.dc:creator: @HeLLnuT HeLLnuT
item.description:
@HeLLnuT wrote:

ok 1st…make sure u hav the codes in the right place…
open client.java and search for

WanneShop = 30; //Aubury Magic Shop }

then paste this code under the }

} else if (NPCID == 165) { //gnome shop keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 39; //fun shop }

now paste these in the right place

shops.cfg

shop = 39	fun_shop	2	2	1933	3	1050	5

autospawn.cfg

spawn = 165	3250	3428

if it dont work then its not the shop its somthign else

Read full topic

item.title: Still got the shop problem (error)
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

let me make a shop

than il post ;D[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 10:27:42 AM[/size][hr]i added this in client.java

} else if (NPCID == 165) { //gnome shop keeper PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 39; //fun shop

than i went to shops.cfg

shop = 39 fun shop 2 2 1933 3 1050 5

than i went to autospawn

spawn = 165 3250 3428 0 3262 3424 3262 3424 1 gnome shop keeper

no error this time…

what the hell!

let me check if i can trade with him

otherwise i make a command to make the shop pop up

[br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2007, 10:34:44 AM[/size][hr]no error

but now i can’t trade the shop

Read full topic

item.title: Still got the shop problem (error)
item.dc:creator: @bloempot99 bloempot99
item.description:
@bloempot99 wrote:

You heard that ALWAYS make backup files, because if you do something wrong, you gotta start all over again.

i did have a backup

but it doesn’t matther… i just can’t add a shop

its because u added in a item that isnt existable to that source like a gadderhammer the only way u could see it is if u are using moparscape with 7995 cache or endar v4 so just take the highest numbered item out of your shop nd then compile that should fix it

i kinda don’t get it :S how u mean take the highest item and compile?

and i don’t got 7995 cache i think :S

Read full topic
